# FlowformLab Project Snapshot

**Timestamp:** 2025-11-06 15:57:51 (SE Asia Standard Time)
**Repo:** D:\seno\GitHub\flowformlab\Repo\notes-site

## Environment

- Shell: PowerShell
- n8n & Ollama in Docker (Windows Desktop)
- Model: llama3.2:1b
- Ollama API: http://host.docker.internal:11434/api/generate

## Git

(git details omitted in writer-only snapshot)

## Front-Matter Validator (last run)

```
(No validator run found at tools\validate_frontmatter.last.json)
```

## Notes

(Add optional notes at: D:\seno\GitHub\flowformlab\Repo\notes-site\tools\progress_manual.txt)

## Next Suggested Steps

- Finalize Node B: AI heading picker in n8n (fix JSON parse ├óΓÇáΓÇÖ Pick Normalizer ├óΓÇáΓÇÖ integration test).
- Use project_note.ps1 to post/update the single board card (no posting from snapshot.ps1).
